name: NBA 2K3
overview: NBA 2K3 is a video game released on October 8, 2002 for the Nintendo GameCube, PlayStation 2, and Xbox. It was published by Sega and developed by Visual Concepts. It is a part of the NBA 2K series. Again, like the previous games, Allen Iverson of the Philadelphia 76ers is the cover athlete. This is the 4th installment of this series.
